Series.Actors: |Michael Emerson|Jim Caviezel|Sarah Shahi|Kevin Chapman|Taraji P. Henson|Enrico Colantoni|Brett Cullen|Amy Acker|
Series.Overview: Person of Interest is an American crime drama television series broadcasting on CBS. It is based on a screenplay developed by Jonathan Nolan. The series revolves around a former CIA officer (Jim Caviezel) recruited by a mysterious billionaire (Michael Emerson) to prevent violent crimes in New York City.

Episode.GuestStars: Natalie Zea|Kevin Chapman|James Hanlon
Episode.Overview: Reese and Finch must figure out whether a young prosecutor is a victim or a suspect.

Episode.GuestStars: Valentina de Angelis|Ritchie Coster|Molly Price
Episode.Overview: Reese and Finch question the machine's reliability when it prompts the investigation of a teenager who was killed years earlier; Finch recalls the origin of the machine.

Episode.GuestStars: James Carpinello|Ruben Santiago-Hudson|Lili Mirojnick
Episode.Overview: Reese infiltrates a gang to get closer to a former Marine that the machine tagged.

Episode.GuestStars: Linda Cardellini
Episode.Overview: Reese and Finch try to unravel a threat to a promising young doctor (Linda Cardellini).

Episode.GuestStars: David Costabile|Meredith Patterson
Episode.Overview: Reese and Finch have the added challenge of investigating a Person of Interest who wants nothing to do with their brand of vigilante justice.

Episode.GuestStars: Paige Turco|Tim Guinee
Episode.Overview: Reese becomes romantically involved with the newest Person of Interest: an attractive woman who isn't all that she seems.

Episode.GuestStars: Enrico Colantoni|Enver Gjokaj|Michael McGlone
Episode.Overview: The Machine identifies a school teacher who witnessed a mob hit as their next POI and Reese and Finch rush to save his life.

Episode.GuestStars: Alan Dale
Episode.Overview: When Reese and Finch discover that their latest POI has connections to Cold War Soviet espionage circles, they quickly learn how covert ops were handled in a world before The Machine.
Reese and Finch’s game of cat and mouse with Detective Carter becomes infinitely more complicated when The Machine declares that she is their newest POI.

Episode.GuestStars: Michael Kelly|Bridget Regan|Michael Murphy|Jack Gwaltney|Melonie Diaz|J. Bernard Calloway
Episode.Overview: As Detective Carter deals with the fallout from her recent encounter with Reese and Finch, The Machine ups the ante for the duo by giving them four Social Security numbers instead of one.

Reese is confined to a wheelchair recovering from his gunshot wound, but Finch sets him up in an apartment where he’s to keep an eye on the Super, who is their latest POI. Also, Finch approaches Carter and gives her a POI to show her what they do.

When Carter finally comes face-to-face with Reese, he urges her to join forces to help with their latest POI, a scrappy young woman from the wrong side of the tracks who turned her life around and became a lawyer.
The Machine gives Reese and Finch the number of a down-and-out man who has been pushed too far, and they're forced to turn to former Person of Interest Zoe Morgan for help.

Episode.GuestStars: Malik Yoba
Episode.Overview: The Machine identifies Darren, a teenager whose brother was just murdered, as the next POI. Meanwhile, Finch is growing concerned that the son of his former business partner is dangerously close to finding out about the Machine.
Reese discovers there’s more to the story after he infiltrates a smuggling ring to get close to his latest POI.
The Machine leads Reese and Finch to Wall Street when a sharp young trader at a major investment bank becomes embroiled in a multi-million dollar financial scam.
Reese and Finch are puzzled when the machine names a 6-month-old baby as the latest person of interest; Detective Carter questions her allegiances when Elias resurfaces.

Episode.GuestStars: Sarah Wynter|Rhys Coiro
Episode.Overview: The Machine's latest number presents a unique challenge for Reese and Finch since the person has virtually no digital footprint - and appears to be leading a double life.
When The Machine spits out five numbers, naming the Don of each of New York’s crime families, Reese and Finch suspect Elias is planning to eliminate his competition.

To track the latest person of interest, Reese goes under cover as part of an armored truck crew; throughout the case, Reese is reminded of tough decisions he was forced to make during his last CIA mission.
On Reese's birthday, Finch gives him the day off in hope of keeping him away from the latest person of interest.
A person of interest winds up in the middle of a dark government conspiracy that Finch is all too familiar with; Reese makes a discovery about Finch's past.
Reese becomes trapped with his POI in a heavily surveilled part of the city and must rely on Finch, Carter and Fusco's help.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Acker|Jay O. Sanders|Cotter Smith|Boris McGiver|Terry Serpico|Bill Sage|Ken Leung
Episode.Overview: Reese asks Detectives Carter and Fusco for help finding Finch, who was kidnapped by his nemesis (Amy Acker).
As Reese investigates a cold case, he gets closer to Finch and his kidnapper, Root.
Reese protects the spoiled daughter of a Brazilian diplomat.

Episode.GuestStars: Jonathan Tucker|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: Reese and Finch wonder if they should intervene when they learn that a mob enforcer's life is in danger; Finch turns to an unexpected source for help.

Episode.GuestStars: Paige Turco|Robert John Burke|Gloria Votsis|Brennan Brown|Clarke Peters|John Ventimiglia|James Saito
Episode.Overview: Reese must surreptitiously protect an investigative reporter without becoming a part of her story.

Episode.GuestStars: Paige Turco|Brett Cullen|Alicia Witt|Dominic Fumusa|Carrie Preston|Victor Verhaeghe|David Denman
Episode.Overview: The Machine’s latest number sends Reese to the suburbs.

Episode.GuestStars: Michael Kelly|Ken Leung|Sharon Leal|Erica Leerhsen|Geneva Carr|Julian Sands|Sam Freed|Bryce Pinkham|Nick Stevenson|Geoffrey Cantor|Gilbert Cruz|Mia Ellis|Aaron Sholomenko|Lohrasp Kansara
Episode.Overview: A resourceful third party raises the stakes as Finch and Reese try to protect their latest person of interest, a brilliant surgeon.

Episode.GuestStars: Mark Pellegrino|Sterling K. Brown|Brett Cullen|Carrie Preston
Episode.Overview: The team faces a challenge when the numbers of both a man and his wife come up in the machine.

Episode.GuestStars: Michael Irby|Robert John Burke|Reiko Aylesworth|Clarke Peters|Tony Plana|Philip Anthony-Rodriguez|David Valcin|Larisa Polonsky|Al Sapienza
Episode.Overview: When the machine names a New York cabdriver as a person of interest, any of his passengers could be a part of the impending crime.

Episode.GuestStars: Jessica Collins|Robert John Burke|Brian J. Smith|Brennan Brown|Clarke Peters|Sterling K. Brown|John Bedford Lloyd|Creighton James|Jeremiah Birkett
Episode.Overview: As the FBI pursues "the man in the suit," Reese is even more determined to protect the latest person of interest after learning she is the sister of a soldier who was killed in action.
Finch goes under cover to protect a youth who reminds him of himself; Carter goes on a dangerous mission for the FBI.

Episode.GuestStars: Karolina Kurkova
Episode.Overview: Carter tries to help Reese by engaging in mental warfare with the FBI; Reese has encounters with old and new enemies; Detective Fusco must protect supermodel Karolina Kurkova, the latest person of interest.

Episode.GuestStars: Annie Parisse|Michael Kelly|Brennan Brown
Episode.Overview: Reese is captured by a former acquaintance planning a massive and potentially deadly act of cyber-warfare.

Episode.GuestStars: Brett Cullen|Charlie Semine|Chandler Williams|Brooke Bloom|Jimmi Simpson
Episode.Overview: Finch and Reese meet their match: a tech billionaire whose curiosity and endless resources could expose their identities and ruin their efforts to save his life.

Episode.GuestStars: Paige Turco|Jay O. Sanders|Sterling K. Brown|Boris McGiver|Brian Hutchison|David Pittu|Ted Koch|Stephen Schnetzer|Mia Maestro
Episode.Overview: As Reese and Finch try to save a hotel maid's life, they encounter a litany of suspects; Detective Carter considers a significant offer from the FBI.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Acker|Paul Sparks|Jay O. Sanders|Boris McGiver|Ebon Moss-Bachrach|Sarah Shahi|Ken Leung
Episode.Overview: The latest POI -- a deadly yet sexy government operative (Sarah Shahi) who tackles terrorist threats -- proves difficult for Reese and Finch to protect.

Episode.GuestStars: Luke Macfarlane|Becky Ann Baker|Dan Lauria|Sterling K. Brown|Brian Hutchison|Cindy Katz|Dennis Flanagan
Episode.Overview: As Finch and Reese try to protect six people simultaneously, clues lead them to a coastal town; when a storm forces Finch and Reese to seek shelter in a police station with a group of locals, they realize a killer may be in their midst.

Episode.GuestStars: Ron McLarty|Robert John Burke|Michael McGlone|Clarke Peters|Sterling K. Brown|Michael Rispoli|Morgan Spector|Al Sapienza|Jennifer Van Dyck|Ken Leung
Episode.Overview: Finch and Reese head to Atlantic City to protect the latest person of interest, an elderly gambler; Carter tries to clear another detective's name.

Episode.GuestStars: Tracie Thoms|Robert John Burke|Sterling K. Brown|Clarke Peters|John Nolan|Larry Bryggman|Andrew Rothenberg|Dan Bittner|Al Sapienza|Sarah Shahi|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: Finch infiltrates a tech corporation to gather intel on an executive whose number has come up; Carter questions Beecher's integrity.

Episode.GuestStars: Dennis Boutsikaris|Robert John Burke|Clarke Peters|Ned Eisenberg|Matthew Humphreys|Allison Scagliotti|Gabrielle Miller|Matthew Rauch|Scott Jaeck|James Hanlon
Episode.Overview: When a person of interest is poisoned, Finch and Reese only have 24 hours to identify the toxin and find the person responsible; Detective Fusco's past catches up to him.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Acker|Brett Cullen|Jay O. Sanders|Carrie Preston|John Nolan|Al Sapienza|Kevin Morrow|Opal Alladin|Sarah Shahi
Episode.Overview: When a virus causes the machine to malfunction, numbers are issued irregularly; the team searches for an extremely elusive tech millionaire.

Episode.GuestStars: Amy Acker|Brett Cullen|Jay O. Sanders|Carrie Preston|Boris McGiver|Morgan Spector|Peter Friedman|Al Sapienza|Jordan Lage|Sarah Shahi|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: Finch and Reese team up with unexpected allies as they race to fix the machine; as Detective Carter tries to apprehend Cal Beecher's murderer, she finds herself up against HR -- a criminal organization.

Episode.GuestStars: Rey Valentin|Max Martini|Bruce Altman|Alano Miller|David Valcin|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: Reese and Shaw struggle to find a naval officer among all those in town for Fleet Week; Carter puts a plan in motion to get rid of those who set her up; Root tests her new surroundings.

Episode.GuestStars: David Alan Basche|Clarke Peters|Leslie Odom Jr.|Gary Basaraba|Brian Wiles|Paul Urcioli
Episode.Overview: Reese tries to protect an Internet entrepreneur who targets people's privacy; Carter is paired with a rookie partner.

Episode.GuestStars: Paige Turco|Warren Kole|Bruce Altman|Ron Raines|Boris McGiver
Episode.Overview: Finch and Reese ask Zoe Morgan, Carter and Shaw to help them determine if a playboy is a predator or a target; Root plots an escape from the psych ward with the help of the machine.

Episode.GuestStars: Kathleen Rose Perkins|Paul Ben-Victor|Annika Boras|Al Sapienza|Brian Wiles|Daniel Cosgrove|Anthony 'Treach' Criss|Jennifer Ikeda
Episode.Overview: The team must figure out if a prominent lawyer orchestrated the murder of her husband or if she is being framed; Carter is spotted with Reese by her new partner.

Episode.GuestStars: Danielle Kotch|Morgan Spector|Brian Wiles|Al Sapienza|Patrick Murney|Stephen Tyrone Williams|Joseph J. Parks|Robert John Burke
Episode.Overview: Shaw must stay close to a 10-year-old girl with highly developed surveillance skills when she is identified by the machine; Carter's mission could be exposed.

Episode.GuestStars: Kirk Acevedo|Leslie Odom Jr.|Michael Esper|Brian Wiles|Donnie Keshawarz|Robert John Burke
Episode.Overview: After being freed from her confinement to the psych ward, Root needs Shaw's help with a directive from the machine; Finch and Reese look into a mild-mannered investigator.

Episode.GuestStars: Aaron Staton|Clarke Peters|Brian Wiles|Jennifer Ferrin|Al Sapienza|Carsten Norgaard|James Joseph O'Neil|Steve Rosen|Robert John Burke|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: The team is met with surprises during an investigation into a hypnotherapist; an antiquities dealer has ties to a crime organization.

Episode.GuestStars: Laz Alonso|Clarke Peters|Morgan Spector|David Valcin|Nick Mennell|Paul O'Brien|Robert John Burke|Enrico Colantoni
Episode.Overview: The machine gives Finch 38 numbers at once; information about Carter's past is revealed.

Episode.GuestStars: Clarke Peters|Lee Tergesen|Khalil Kain|Paul O'Brien|Devin Ratray|Robert John Burke
Episode.Overview: The battle to bring a crime organization to justice reaches a new level; Reese's number comes up in the machine.

Episode.GuestStars: Clarke Peters|Richard Brooks|Brian Tarantina|Robert John Burke
Episode.Overview: As the team seeks justice for a death, Finch fears one team member will go too far; the number of one of HR's key players comes up in the machine.

Episode.GuestStars: Saul Rubinek|Boris McGiver|Leslie Odom Jr.|Tom Degnan|Tuck Milligan|Chris Bert|Camryn Manheim
Episode.Overview: Flashbacks reveal Finch's creation of the machine; Reese hits the road, leaving the team to deal with the aftermath of their war with HR.

Episode.GuestStars: Saul Rubinek|Boris McGiver|Leslie Odom Jr.|Jennifer Lim|Tuck Milligan|Chris Bert|Camryn Manheim
Episode.Overview: Multiple enemies target the team as they try to protect a dying man; Reese's absence could lead to catastrophic repercussions.

Episode.GuestStars: Sally Pressman|Samm Levine|Boris McGiver|Marc Kudisch|Bill English
Episode.Overview: Reese gets on an international flight -- intending to leave the team and the past behind -- but realizes his travel plans were manipulated.

Episode.GuestStars: Elaine Tan|Henri Lubatti|Gene Farber|Christopher Neal Jackson|Stelio Savante
Episode.Overview: Reese comes back to New York; surprising events lead to the team planning a heist that could send them all to jail.

Episode.GuestStars: Melissa Sagemiller|Gavin Stenhouse|Kathleen McNenny|David Andrew Macdonald
Episode.Overview: Finch tries to protect a 911 operator by going under cover in an emergency call center; the threat proves to be larger than anticipated.

Episode.GuestStars: Camryn Manheim|Neil Jackson|Joseph Mazzello|Jay O. Sanders|John Nolan|Julian Ovenden|Casey Siemaszko|Annie Parisse
Episode.Overview: Secrets of Finch's pre-Reese operation are revealed -- including surprising ties to current events.

Episode.GuestStars: Colin Donnell
Episode.Overview: The Machine assigns Root to seek out a janitor with a mysterious past, but when her very presence puts his life in danger, Finch also receives his number.

Episode.GuestStars: Nazneen Contractor|Haaz Sleiman|John Nolan|Michael Gill|Casey Biggs|William Abadie
Episode.Overview: When Reese and Finch have to protect a former government contractor who is following a UN diplomat, they are thrust into the murky waters of international politics.

Episode.GuestStars: Nestor Carbonell|John Doman|Leslie Odom Jr.|Rob McClure|James McMenamin|Rosa Arredondo|Joe Coots|Camryn Manheim
Episode.Overview: In order to protect the latest person of interest, Shaw and Reese go under cover at a high school reunion; Fusco and Finch go to Washington, D.C., to investigate Vigilance's most recent attack.

Episode.GuestStars: John Heard|John Doman|John Nolan|Morocco Omari|Murphy Guyer|Tracy Howe
Episode.Overview: Reese goes under cover as a secret service agent in order to get close to the latest person of interest, a congressman who may have the key to derailing Decima's plan for a second machine.

Episode.GuestStars: Carrie Preston|John Doman|John Nolan|Matt Walton|John Horton
Episode.Overview: Reese and Shaw are hunted by Decima; Greer uses Finch's greatest weakness -- his former fiancee -- to lure him out of hiding.

Episode.GuestStars: Leslie Odom Jr.|John Doman|Joseph Mazzello|Michael Esper|John Nolan|Boris McGiver|Joseph Melendez|Kelly AuCoin|Marc Damon Johnson|Camryn Manheim
Episode.Overview: The machine sends the team five different numbers to investigate when an unknown entity blocks details about an impending catastrophic event; Root's hackers arrive in New York.

Episode.GuestStars: Leslie Odom Jr.|John Doman|John Nolan|Julian Ovenden|Boris McGiver|Peter Scanavino|Joseph Melendez|Camryn Manheim
Episode.Overview: The team work to stop Samaritan from coming online and targeting them; the battle against Vigilance reaches a conclusion.
